sentences.en: Half of Hamburgers want changes to the plans ; a fifth think them completely wrongheaded.
sentences.cn: 这个数字是发起公投所需签名的三倍.

sentences.en: He told them exactly how wrongheaded they were.
sentences.cn: 他实实在在地跟他们说他们有多执迷不悟。

words.tran_cn: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
错误地；邪恶的，不正当地
错误地；不恰当地；不公正地

trans.tran_cn: 判断错误的，固执的，坚持错误的
trans.tran_en: used to describe an idea, plan, or belief that someone has, that is based on wrong ideas that they are not willing to change
